title: Inferno Fork
summaries: The Inferno Fork is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that fires a moderately slow-moving fireball which explodes into a large, circular cloud of damaging fire that lasts for two seconds upon contact with an enemy or surface. The cloud of fire deals (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 75% damage (52 damage) / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 65% damage (45 damage). The initial fireball and the resulting explosion also inflict damaged enemies with the (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Hellfire / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) On Fire! debuff for 8â€“15 seconds. The Inferno Fork has a 1/20 (5%) / 59/800 (7.38%) chance of being dropped by Diabolists in the post-Plantera Dungeon.

statistics.Knockback: 5 (Average) (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 8 (Very strong) (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
statistics.Tooltip: Launches a ball of fire that explodes into a raging inferno
